Description: There are Slim Waist Packs and wallet in the box,which have Bluetooth Motherboard inside. Specification Waist Packs Size: 7.08 inch Wide, 4.33 inch High. 0.78 inch Thick. Materials: Vegetable Tanned Leather. Structure: It has wallet pocket, key bag/cigarette pocket and cell phone pocket. It can take driving license. It can not hold cell phone . It has 2 belt holes. One takes 1.6inch wide belt and another one takes 4 inch wide special belt. Special Design: There is bluetooth motherboard inside the waist pack. The wallet is connected to the waist packs via bluetooth before shipping. And when wallet is taken away from the waist packs about 50 feet, the waist packs will vibrate and beep continually while the wallet will also beep continually till the battery is dead if you do not stop the alert by pressing the button or put it close to the belt. The cell phone can be connected to the waist with the app which you can download from google play or app store. After it is connected, the belt will vibrate and beep when the phone is taken away about 50 feet from the belt while the cell phone will also alert with special sounds which were specially made. Super Slim but be able to hold your wallet, keys and cellphone which everyone need to take when going out. You can cover it with t-shirt when you wear it and others will think you do not wear a bag on your waist , so it looks nicer compared with carrying a tradiontal big fanny packs. It is suitable for business occasion. It can free your pocket , hand and your shoulder as you do not need to carry a bag every time when you go out or put stuff in your pocket which makes you feel uncomfortable. Wallet Size: 3.5x3.34x0.4 inch. Materials: Vegetable Tanned Leather. Card Slots: 3 card slot which can hold 6 bank cards. Coin Bag: It has coin bag on the right side. Cash Pocket: 1 cash pocket which can take 100 usd cash. It can hold 1000 USD cash. Special Feature: The bluetooth motherboard is put inside and only the connector is visible . The wallet is connected to the waist packs via bluetooth and they are connected before shipping. You just use it after you have it. When the wallet is taken away by somebody or left behind or slipped out of your pocket, the belt will vibrate and beep continually to warn you while the wallet also beeps continually until the battery is dead. Special Design: It is very thin and very small. It has coin pocket. Alert System How does the alert system work?There is bluetooth motherboard inside the waist packs, wallet. The wallet is connected to the waist packs via bluetooth before shipping. And when wallet is taken away from the waist packs about 50 feet, the waist packs will vibrate and beep continually while the wallet will also beep continually till the battery is dead if you do not stop the alert by pressing the button or put it close to the belt. The cell phone can be connected to the waist packs with the app which you can download from google play or app store. After it is connected, the belt will vibrate and beep when the phone is taken away about 50 feet from the belt while the cell phone will also alert with special sounds which were specially made. How can i stop the alert?Once the alert is going , it will stop alerting automatically when you put them back close to the belt. While you can also press the button 2 times quickly to stop it. The button position is marked with sticker. We have manual to tell you how to operate it. How can i charge it?Simply plug micro usb cable to the computer or wall charger to charge it. It takes about 1 hour to make full charge. And one full charge can last 2 weeks for belt and 1 month for wallet, key bag and passport case. How can i turn it on/off?When you do not want it to work, you can turn it off by pressing the button 3 times quickly. Refer to the manual please. How does the app on the phone work?After you install the app , you can connect it to the belt or disconnect it. You can also turn on/off the alert and the alert sound can be changed and customised. How can i download the app?Go to app store for iPhone and google play for android phone and type in SMART POUCH to search it. After you see it whose icon is SZJZKB, click to download it. During the installation , make sure you allow the app to run in the background always and MUST make it protected for android phone. How do i know the battery status?It has low battery alert, which is that it beeps 3 times every 3 minutes which will last 24 hours if you ignore it.
